name: Atlantris
description:
This is an early demo of our upcoming game Atlantris.

Gameplay:
Your friend tries to destroy you with cubes from the sky while you are running away from creatures attacking you from the sea on a sinking island and climbing high enough to kick your friend's ass on multiple levels.
This game features a lot of particle effects and screenshake because it's cool, extremely challenging gameplay for both players because its also cool, and voxel based graphics with crazy chiptune music and very wow ambients because why not.

Vote for us on steam greenlight at:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
GG- the Lighthouse Team
